V03vinv15_u:319: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv15_u:322: sā cāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv15_u:324: tasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv15_u:327: ayaṃ dārako dattasya gṛhapateḥ putras tasmād bhavatu dārakasya sudatta iti nāmeti;
V03vinv15_u:334: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṃkajam;
V03vinv15_u:335: so 'pareṇa samayena sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣito dhātryaṃsagato niṣaṇṇo bahirnirgataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:354: āryaputra yady evaṃ nainaṃ bhūyo 'py alaṃkariṣyāmi;
V03vinv15_u:356: bhadre asty asmākaṃ suvarṇam aprameyaṃ ratnāni ca;
V03vinv15_u:361: yāvad apareṇa samayena datto gṛhapatir bhṛtyajanaparivṛto (MSV III 135)
V03vinv15_u:386: tatas tenobhau pāṇī nadyām āplāvya suvarṇapūrṇās catvāro lohasaṃghāṭā uddhṛtāḥ; kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:387: tāta atas tnaṃ yāvadāptaḥṃḥ dhanena dhanakāryaṃ kṛtvāvaśiṣṭam atraiva plāvaya;
V03vinv15_u:388: putra kiṃ tvaṃ jalagatān nidhīn paśyasi?
V03vinv15_u:389: tāta na kevalaṃ jalagatān sthalagatān api sasvāmikān asvāmikān api ye 'pi dūre ye 'py antike;
V03vinv15_u:391: śakyam evaṃvidhena dānaptinā dānaṃ dātum iti viditvā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:392: putra yady evaṃ dehi dānaṃ yatheṣṭam iti;
V03vinv15_u:394: na tāvat putro yaśasvī bhavati yāvad asya pitā jīvatīti
V03vinv15_u:395: yāvad apareṇa samayena datto gṛhapatiḥ kālagataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:397: satatam anāthebhyaḥ piṇḍakam anuprayacchatīti samantāc chadbo visṛtaḥ:
V03vinv15_u:398: dattasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ sudatto gṛhasvāmī saṃvrṭtaḥ; (Śay-v 13)
V03vinv15_u:402: tatas tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānitaṃ;
V03vinv15_u:403: sa tayā sārdham krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv15_u:404: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:410: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāpro vyavasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:414: kasmāt tvaṃ gṛhapate kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparas tiṣṭhasīti;
V03vinv15_u:417: saptamasya sujātasya sadṛśakulaṃ cintayāmi katarat tat kulaṃ yato 'sya niveṣaṃ kariṣyāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:419: alpotsukas tiṣṭha aham asya sadṛśaṃ kulaṃ gaveṣayāmi;
V03vinv15_u:425: rājagṛhe anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo 'nāthapiṇḍadasya pratirūpaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:426: sa tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo dvāraśālāyāṃ sthitvā kathayati:
V03vinv15_u:432: śrāvastyām anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasya putraḥ sujāto nāmnā;
V03vinv15_u:436: śatam aśvānāṃ śataṃ niṣkāṇāṃ śatam aśvatarīrathānāṃ śataṃ kāmbojikānāṃ kanyānām iti;
V03vinv15_u:439: tenāpi vācayitvā pratīccha sarvaṃ mayā deyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:441: tatas taiḥ śucinā praṇītena prabhūtenāhāreṇa saṃtarpito mānavakaḥ śālāṃ gatvā vāsam upagato viṣūcitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:443: sa tair aśucibhayād bahir niṣkāsayitvā cchoritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:444: daivād āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau taṃ pradeśam āgatau;
V03vinv15_u:446: tatas tābhyāṃ vaṃśavidalikayā nirlikhya pāṇḍumṛttikayā udvartya snāpitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:449: sa tayor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:451: sa vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya sakāśaṃ gatvā bhavanaṃ prārthayate;
V03vinv15_u:453: gaccha tad eva te śivikādvāraṃ bhavanam iti;
V03vinv15_u:455: videharājena rājño biṃbisārasya haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ sātam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv15_u:457: mama videharājena haimavatānāṃ nāgānāṃ śatam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv15_u:459: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yena rājā prasenajit kosalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:460: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kosalam idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:464: śobhanaṃ gaccha mamāpi tasmāt hastiśatam āneyaṃ (MSV III 138)
V03vinv15_u:467: deva yadi mama tatra prayojanaṃ ḥnaḥ bhavati grahīṣyāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:473: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam ādāya rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv15_u:474: sa yasya gṛhapater gṛhe vāsam upagataḥ sa gṛhapatiḥ sarātram evotthāyāntarjanam āmaṃtrayate:
V03vinv15_u:482: kiṃ punar asya gṛhapater āvāho vā vivāho vā bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:484: śreṇī vā, pūgo vā parṣado vā?
V03vinv15_u:485: rājā vānena māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:486: iti viditvā taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:487: kiṃ punas te gṛhapate āvāho vā bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv15_u:488: vivāho vā rāṣṭraṃ vā tvayā bhaktenopanimantritaṃ śreṇī vā pūgo vā parṣado vā rājā vā te māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantrita iti;
V03vinv15_u:490: gṛhapate na me āvāho bhaviṣyati na vivāho vā nāpi mayā rāṣṭraṃ bhaktenopanimantritaṃ,
V03vinv15_u:491: na śreṇī na pūgo na parṣado nāpi rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhaktenopanimantritaḥ api tu buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantrita;
V03vinv15_u:492: iti anāthapaiṇḍadasya gṛhapater buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny (A 318b)
V03vinv15_u:493: āhṛṣṭāni; sa āhṛṣṭaromakūpas taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:497: śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:501: santi gṛhapate kṣatriyakulād api kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇy vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:502_0: brāhmaṇakulād api vaiśyakulād api śūdrakulād api kulaputrāḥ keāśaśmaśrū avatārya
V03vinv15_u:502_1: kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā anāgārād anāgārikāṃ tam eva bhagavantaṃ
V03vinv15_u:504: ḥśvaḥḥ sa mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṅgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:505: kutra gṛhapate sa bhagavān etarhi viharati?
V03vinv15_u:508: tena hi gṛhapate āgamaya tāvat tvam;
V03vinv15_u:509: sthānam etad vidyate yad ihāgataṃ śvo drakṣyasi;
V03vinv15_u:510: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tāṃ rātriṃ buddhālambanayā smṛtyā middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:512: tena khalu samayena śivakadvāraṃ rātryā dvau yāmau vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv15_u:514: māhaiva āgantukānāṃ gamikānāṃ ca dūtānāṃ vighno bhaviṣyatīti;
V03vinv15_u:515: yāvat paśyati śivakadvāraṃ vivṛtam ālokena ca sphuṭam;
V03vinv15_u:519: iti viditvā tenaiva ālokena nagarān niṣkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:526: māhaiva kaścid viheṭayen manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vā dhūrtako vā asaṃprāptam vā syāt prabhūtaṃ kulaśulkam iti;
V03vinv15_u:527: viditvā pratinivartitukāmo madhuskandhasya devaputrasya sthaṇḍilaṃ pradakṣiṇīkaroti,
V03vinv15_u:531: adyaivāyaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantam apāsya anyadevatānamaskāraṃ kariṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:532: iti viditvā yāvacca śivakadvāraṃ yavac ca śītavanaṃ śmaśānam atrāntarād udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:538: śatam aśvā śataṃ niṣkāḥ śatam aśvatarīrathāḥ /
V03vinv15_u:562: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis taṃ devaputram idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:564: aham asmi gṛhapate madhuskandho nāma māṇavaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:566: so 'haṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataś cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ,
V03vinv15_u:575: yatredānīṃ devatā api autsukyam āpadyante tasya bhagavato darśanāya;
V03vinv15_u:576: iti viditvā yena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:577: tena khalu samayena bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe bhagavān caṅkrameṇa caṅkramyate,
V03vinv15_u:579: adrākṣīd anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavantam durād eva;
V03vinv15_u:580: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:581: upasaṅkramya bhagavantam gṛhapatiḥ pratisaṃmodanayā pratisammodate: (MSV III 142)
V03vinv15_u:583: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate;
V03vinv15_u:584: sarvathā vai sukhaṃ śete brāhmaṇaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ / (Śay-v 17)
V03vinv15_u:585: lipyate yo na kāmair hi vipramukto nirupadhiḥ //
V03vinv15_u:588: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim ādāya vihāraṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:589: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhpatir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:590: ekānte niṣaṇṇam anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati,
V03vinv15_u:592: yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,
V03vinv15_u:593: tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṃkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv15_u:594: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīt hṛṣṭacittaṃ kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātum,
V03vinv15_u:595: tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv15_u:596: athānāthapiṇḍado gḥapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvaṛy āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv15_u:598: tasyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti,
V03vinv15_u:599: evam evānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasminn eva āsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv15_u:600: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti;
V03vinv15_u:601: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā (MSV III 143)
V03vinv15_u:602: paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣo tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
V03vinv15_u:603: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjalim praṇamya bhagavantam idam (A 319b)
V03vinv15_u:607: upāsakam māṃ ca dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv15_u:608: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam āvocat:
V03vinv15_u:612: tato mām anāthapiṇṣado gṛhapatir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir iti janaḥ sañjānīte;
V03vinv15_u:614: asti bhadanta prācīneṣu janapadeṣu śrāvastī nāma kosalānāṃ nigamaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:617: Anāthapiṇḍada invites the Buddha to Śrāvastī
V03vinv15_u:619: ahaṃ bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaglānapratyayabhaiṣaiyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena;
V03vinv15_u:622: yatra gṛhapate vihārāḥ santi tatra bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv15_u:624: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā śrāvastyāṃ vihārā bhaviṣyanti;
V03vinv15_u:625: bhikṣavaś ca āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ maṃsyanta iti;
V03vinv15_u:627: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:628: tato 'sya yad rājagṛhe kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā pariprāpya (MSV III 144)
V03vinv15_u:630: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:632: anuprayaccha me bhagavan bhikṣuṃ sahāyakan yena sahāyakena śrāvastyāṃ bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmīti;
V03vinv15_u:634: katarasya bhikṣor anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro śrāvastīnivāsī ca janakāyo vidheyaḥ?
V03vinv15_u:637: samanvāhara śāriputra anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ saparivāraṃ śrāvastīnivāsinaṃ ca janakāyam iti;
V03vinv15_u:639: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt ptakrāntaḥ
V03vinv15_u:642: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputras tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya,
V03vinv15_u:644: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratiśamayya,
V03vinv15_u:647: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ śambalam ādāya ekaikarātrinivāsena śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:648: sa praviśann eva śrāvastīm ārāmeṇārāmam udyānenodyānam upavanenopavanaṃ caṅkramam anucaṅkramyamāṇo suvicarann evam āha:
V03vinv15_u:649: kataraḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati śrāvastyā nātidūre (Śay-v 19)
V03vinv15_u:653: jetasya kumarasyārāmam śrāvastyā nātidūre nātyāsanne divā alpākīṇam alpavilāpaṃ rātrāv alpaśabdṃ alpanirghoṣaṃ alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasparśam;
V03vinv15_u:656: sa praviśann eva svaṃ niveśanaṃ yena jetaḥ kumāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:659: ahaṃ tatra bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmi iti;
V03vinv15_u:663: dvir api trir apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaṃ kumāram idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:667: punar apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptir jetaṃ kumaram idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:673: tau kṛtārgho na kṛtargha iti vivādam āpannau,
V03vinv15_u:676: ayam anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir udyukto bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ vihāraṃ māpayitum;
V03vinv15_u:680: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaś ca kumāro vyāvahārikasakāśam upasaṅkrāntau;
V03vinv15_u:681: athānāthapiṇḍako gṛhapatir vyāvahārikapuruṣāṇām etam arthaṃ vistareṇa nivedayati;
V03vinv15_u:687: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ śakaṭair bhāraiḥ mūṭaiḥ piṭakair uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ suvarṇam abhinirhṛtya,
V03vinv15_u:691: tataḥ anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir etam arthaṃ cintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm asthāt;
V03vinv15_u:694: nātiprabhūtaṃ yena ayam anāstīrṇaḥ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ āstariṣyati;
V03vinv15_u:698: kasmād ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajāmi;
V03vinv15_u:700: avocat; sacet te ha gṛhapate vipratisāraḥ pratīccha suvarṇam;
V03vinv15_u:703: api tv aham etam evārtham anucintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:711: yatredānīm ayaṃ gṛhapatir ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajati;
V03vinv15_u:712: iti viditvā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv15_u:715: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetasya kumārasya anāstīrṇaṃ pṛthivīpradeśam anuprayacchati;
V03vinv15_u:716: yatra jetaḥ kumāro bhagavato 'rthāya dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ māpayati
V03vinv15_u:719: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ māpayitum ārabdha iti tīvradveṣaparyākulīkṛtamanasas tīrthyās te saṃbhūya yenānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:721: mā tvaṃ gṛhapate śramaṇasya gautamasya arthāyātra vihāraṃ kāraya;
V03vinv15_u:740: upasaṅkramyāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;

V03vinv15_u:955: upasaṅkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau vanditvā alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca spārśavihāratāṃ ca;

V03vinv15_u:1040: Previous births of Anāthapiṇḍada at the time of the seven Buddhas
V03vinv15_u:1041: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv15_u:1042: kutra bhadantānāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatināyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātitapūrvaḥ?
V03vinv15_u:1044_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava ekanavate kalpe vipāśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
V03vinv15_u:1044_1: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:1046: tena khalu samayenāsyāṃ śrāvastyāṃ tiṣyo nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:1047: tenāyaṃ pradeśaḥ ṣaṭkrośahiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya rājakumārasyāntikāt krītvā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1049: tiṣyasya gṛhapater bhāgineyaḥ tatsaṃparkād vipaśyini tathāgate 'tyartham abhiprasannaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1053: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenāham etaṃ rātrau divā cānāvṛtaṃ pāśyeyam iti tasyāntevasinā samudratīrasthenāvabhāsātmakaṃ maṇiratnaṃ prāvṛtam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv15_u:1055: tadanubhāvād asau taṃ keśanakhastūpaṃ divā rātrau cānāvṛtaṃ paśyati;
V03vinv15_u:1057: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo mama mātulena kumārasyāntikāt krītvā hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1058: evam aham imam pṛthivīpradeśaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇenāstīrya saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ niryātayeyam;
V03vinv15_u:1059: yaś ca teṣām apaścimaka tasyāham antike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām iti
V03vinv15_u:1062: bhāgineya eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:1063: tato 'rvāg ekatriṃśatime kalpe śikhī nāma sāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad huddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:1065: tena kyalu punaḥ samayena puṣyo nāma gṛhaptir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:1066: tenāyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo ardhatṛtīyān kośān maṇibhir āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya śikhinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1067: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣyo nāma grhapatir abhūd iti?
V03vinv15_u:1069: api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhaptis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:1070: tato 'rvak tasminn evaikatriṃśatime kalpe viśvabhuṅ nāma śāstā loka utpannaḥ pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:1072: tena khalu samayena māghur nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:1073: tenāyaṃ pradeśo dvau krośau muktikābhir āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya viśvabhujaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1075: sa tena kālena tena samayena māghur māghur nāma gṛhapatir abhūd iti?
V03vinv15_u:1076: na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyam api tv eṣa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena

V03vinv15_u:1079: tena khalu samayena bhavadatto nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:1080: tenāpy ayaṃ prādeśo gobhiḥ pūrayitvā kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya krakutsundasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśravakasaṃghasya niryātitaḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1081: syāt khalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena bhavadatto nāma gṛthapatir abhūd iti?

V03vinv15_u:1084: tato 'rvāg asminn eva bhadrake kalpe triṃṣadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kanakamunir nāma śāstā loka udapādi pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv15_u:1086: tena khalu samayena bṛhaspatir nāma gṛhapatir abhūt;
V03vinv15_u:1087: tenāpy ayaṃ pradeśaḥ paṭṭair āstīrya kumārasyāntikān niṣkrīya niṣkrīya kanakamuneḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitāḥ;
V03vinv15_u:1088: syāt khalu ḥyuṣmākaṃḥ bhikṣavo 'nyatamaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena bṛhaspatir nāma gṛhapatir abhūd iti?
V03vinv15_u:1090: api tv esa evāsāv anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tena kālena tena samayena
V03vinv15_u:1091: tato 'rvāg asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi pūrvavad yāvad buddho bhagavān:
